Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem where two people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can draw a string telephone that shows how it allows people to talk to each other over that distance.
The student can include details that highlight how sound travels through the string to enable communication.
The student can show how the materials provided (such as cups and string) are used in their string telephone design.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone solves the problem by effectively sending sound from one person to the other.
